Name: SKIP
column13: All unit buffs, Varies by # of temples: 1: +2 vision 2: Strengthened +5 Toughness +5 3: +2 move 4: Tenacity 20 5: Strengthed +20 Toughness +10

Name: Fountain
Regular Effect: Start of turn heal combatants in radius 1 by 15 health
Ancient Ground Effect: Start of turn heal combatants in radius 2 by 25 health

Name: Laboratory
Ancient Ground Effect: Targeted Spell +1 range, Cloud Spell +1 cloud level
